overview: The Best of Damien Lucas brings some of this twink bottom’s hottest scenes to one sultry collection. Watch Fratboys Ross Michaels and Trystian Sweet take command of Lucas’ tight hole. Continue with hung twinks Michael Lee and Ryan Conners pounding home. Finish finally with the innocence of Keirin Brinson and Nick White as they play with Damien‘s bubbly bottom boy hole.
title: The Best of Damien Lucas
